item.description:
Ok, it's really just one, not many, but your choice for our "R" restaurant is a return visit for SSDOMG: We dined there first in May of '07.

The results of the poll were actually a surprise to your Org Team: Not that we didn't realize that Rustic Kitchen is a popular destination (we try to keep up with such things), but we didn't expect to see it trounce the competition, including some other local favorites, by better than 2 to 1! Sorry, Raffael's! Sorry, Red Parrot! Apparently our members contemplated the prospect of dining on the waterfront in January and decided it would be a cold day in Hull...

In any event, we are pleased to announce that we'll be heading back to Rustic Kitchen on Wednesday evening, January 20th, at 7:00 p.m. This was a popular venue the last time we went, and we're expecting that the response this time will be just as strong. If you're unfamiliar with the restaurant, please have a look at the writeup of our earlier visit, or at their website.

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Rustic Kitchen
Wednesday, January 20 @ 7:00 p.m.
94 Derby Street (Derby Street Shoppes)
Hingham, MA
(781) 749-2700
Website

Organizer: Mike

Guests: Yes. One per member allowed.

Price Range: Dinner offerings mostly range from $18.00 - $23.00. Lowest price on the online menu (if you don't count the $12.00 "Grilled Rustic Burger") is $15.00 (Linguini and Meatballs), highest is $29.00 (9oz Filet Mignon).

Cash Only Policy: Please bring cash! Paying for all of our meals in cash has been SSDOMG'S policy for over three years. It allows us to avoid the confusion of having the waitstaff run multiple credit card slips and generally helps to keep things simpler for everyone.

Event Fee: Annual Members - None. Group Members and Guests - $2.00.

RSVP Deadline: Tuesday, January 19 @ 7:00 p.m. Any changes made after this time may not be seen by an Event Organizer. Changes to No after this point will be considered No-Shows per our guidelines on the About Us page.

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Directions

Overview: Rustic Kitchen is located in the Derby Street Shoppes off Route 53 in Hingham, MA.

From Route 3: Take Exit 15 towards Route 53/S. Hingham - Take a Right off the exit ramp coming from Route 3 southbound or a Left off the Exit ramp coming from Route 3 northbound - Follow to the first set of lights. Take a Right at the first set of lights into the Derby Street Shoppes.

From Route 53 heading North: Follow Route 53 North to Queen Anne's Corner. Route 53 will bear off to the right. You want to bear to the left (of Route 53) onto Derby Street. Follow about 1-2 miles till you see the Derby Street Shoppes on your left. Take a left at the lights into the Derby Street Shoppes.
item.how_to_find_us: Our reservation is under both 'Mike' and 'South Shore Meetup Group'.

group.name: The South Shore Dining Out Meetup Group

item.name: Many Rustic Returns!
